titleStmt.title: The true copy of a petition promoted in the Army, and already presented to His Excellency the Lord General, by the officers and soldiers of the regiment under the command of Commissary General Ireton.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
Morgan, Anthony, Sir, 1621-1668.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Anthony Morgan [and six others].
Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] ye 29th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
